name: Super Synonyms Quiz | Words for Kids | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which of the following is a synonym for the word "tremble"?
questions.explanation:
shake.

	If someone starts to shake it can be said that they are starting to tremble. Shiver would be another "s" word that is a synonym.

questions.text: Which of the following is a synonym for the word "doze"?
questions.explanation:
sleep.

	The correct choice is sleep. To doze usually means you are sleeping lightly or for a short time.

questions.text: Which of the following is a synonym for the word "tart"?
questions.explanation:
sour.

	I like lemonade because it is tart, which is just another way of saying it is sour.

questions.text: Which of the following is a synonym for the word "petite"?
questions.explanation:
small.

	If you say someone is petite it means that they are small. It is usually used when describing females.

questions.text: Which of the following is a synonym for the word "clog"?
questions.explanation:
shoe.

	A clog is a type of shoe with a thick wooden sole. This style came from Europe.

questions.text: Which of the following is a synonym for the word "faint"?
questions.explanation:
swoon.

	Swooning and fainting are the same thing. To swoon usually indicates that you faint with joy as opposed to fear.

questions.text: Which of the following is a synonym for the word "laziness"?
questions.explanation:
sloth.

	Sloth is one of the seven deadly sins listed in the Bible. It means to be lazy and avoid work.

questions.text: Which of the following is a synonym for the word "gutter"?
questions.explanation:
spout.

	A spout and a gutter are both channels or pipes used for the drainage of water. They can be found on roofs, streets, and yards.

questions.text: Which of the following is a synonym for the word "grimace"?
questions.explanation:
scowl.

	To grimace is the same thing as to scowl. Both are looks that show unhappiness.

questions.text: Which of the following is a synonym for the word "beam"?
questions.explanation:
smile.

	If someone is beaming that means they are smiling. Beaming usually means a very big smile.
